name: Myrmidon's warboots, designed for steadfast stance
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It increases the users constitution an average amount.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
